Function reference

Themes

theme_sf_light()
San Francisco Light Theme
theme_sf_dark()
San Francisco Dark Theme

Typography

import_inter()
Import Fonts
sf_set_inter() sf_set_sf_pro() sf_set_custom_font()
Set Fonts

Scales

Collection of color scales and fill optimized for light and dark themes.

iOS

scale_colour_ios_light() scale_fill_ios_light()
iOS Light Color Scales
scale_colour_ios_dark() scale_fill_ios_dark()
iOS Dark Color Scales
scale_colour_ios_gray_light() scale_fill_ios_gray_light()
iOS Gray Light Color Scales
scale_colour_ios_gray_dark() scale_fill_ios_gray_dark()
iOS Gray Dark Color Palette

macOS Light

scale_colour_macos_light() scale_fill_macos_light()
macOS Light Color Scales
scale_colour_macos_dark() scale_fill_macos_dark()
macOS Dark Color Scales

watchOS Dark

scale_colour_watchos_dark() scale_fill_watchos_dark()
watchOS Dark Color Scales

Palettes

For accesing the raw colors, or using colors with other visualization packages than ggplot2 library.

ios_light_pal() ios_dark_pal() ios_gray_light_pal() ios_gray_dark_pal()
iOS Color Palettes
macos_light_pal() macos_dark_pal()
macOS Color Palettes
watchos_dark_pal()
watchOS Color Palette
